promotionMessage:
To participate in the contest:
1. Follow @prakarsh2K18 on Instagram
2. Post images with hashtag: #Prakarsh2K18
3. Instagram profile should be publicly visible during Feb 19-21.

Top 8 Instagrammers will be awarded on 22nd February 2018 based on the total no. of likes they receive on posts with #Prakarsh2K18.
